mapper.insert: insert into StaffInfo(staffName, staffSex, staffBirthday, staffNation, staffRace, staffEmail, staffPhoneNumber) values (#{staffName}, #{staffSex}, #{staffBirthday}, #{staffNation}, #{staffRace}, #{staffEmail}, #{staffPhoneNumber})
mapper.select: select id, staffName, staffSex, staffBirthday, staffNation, staffRace, staffEmail, staffPhoneNumber where id = #{id}
